name: Mages and Essay Pages
description:
Play in fullscreen so that everything works correctly ;).

You have an Essay deadline at midnight, but you want to play Mage Hunter! Convince yourself in a card game battle with dopamine, psychology and excuses that you will find while slaying mages. But remember, the deadline is inevitable...

Controls are simple: WASD to move, left-click to attack, and LeftShift to dash. 

I had tonnes of fun making this game during Ludum Dare 50, and I also learned a lot (I started with game Dev about a month ago). I really like the concept however I think that the game is very unbalanced at the moment (sometimes RNG just destroys you, sometimes there is no challenge). I might work on this some more and make an actual small game out of it.

Any feedback is appreciated!

All coding and art by me
Sound effects generated by jsfxr - 8 bit sound maker and online sfx generator.
